entry.title: åˆ¤æ–­ç¨‹åºå¤„äºåå°

function isAppBackground()
  local Context = luajava.bindClass "android.content.Context"
  local ActivityManager = luajava.bindClass "android.app.ActivityManager"
  local activityManager = activity.getSystemService(Context.ACTIVITY_SERVICE)
  --æ­£åœ¨è¿è¡Œçš„åº”ç”¨ä¿¡æ¯åˆ—è¡¨
  local runningAppProcesses = activityManager.getRunningAppProcesses()
  for i=0,#runningAppProcesses-1 do
    local appProcess = runningAppProcesses.get(i)
    --åŒ…åä¸€è‡´
    if activity.getPackageName()==appProcess.processName then
      print("è¿›ç¨‹"..appProcess.processName.."ä¼˜å…ˆçº§"..appProcess.importance)
      local appBackground
      --æ˜¯å¦åå°
      if appProcess.importance==ActivityManager.RunningAppProcessInfo.IMPORTANCE_FOREGROUND
        or appProcess.importance==ActivityManager.RunningAppProcessInfo.IMPORTANCE_VISIBLE then
        appBackground = false
       else
        appBackground = true
      end
      return appBackground
    end
  end
end
--è¿›å…¥activityä¼šä¾æ¬¡æ‰§è¡ŒonStartï¼ŒonResumeï¼Œæ ¹æ®éœ€è¦é€‰æ‹©å…¶ä¸­ä¸€ä¸ªæ‰§è¡Œæ‰€éœ€é€»è¾‘å³å¯
function onStart()
  print("onStart")
  print(isAppBackground())
end
function onResume()
  print("onResume")
  print(isAppBackground())
end
--ç¦»å¼€activityä¾æ¬¡æ‰§è¡ŒonPauseï¼ŒonStop
function onPause()
  print("onPause")
  print(isAppBackground())
end
function onStop()
  print("onStop")
  --åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦è¿›å…¥åå°éœ€è¦åœ¨onStopä¸­ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥è¿™ä¸ªè‚¯å®šéœ€è¦çš„
  print(isAppBackground())
end

import "android.graphics.drawable.GradientDrawable"
function è¾¹æ¡†(ID,ç²—ç»†,é¢œè‰²,å†…éƒ¨é¢œè‰²,radiu,è™šçº¿)
  if (å†…éƒ¨é¢œè‰²~=nil) and (ID~=nil and ç²—ç»†~=nil and radiu~=nil) then
    local dr = GradientDrawable()
    dr.setShape(GradientDrawable.RECTANGLE)
    if è™šçº¿~=nil and type(è™šçº¿)=="number" then
      dr.setStroke(ç²—ç»†,é¢œè‰² or å†…éƒ¨é¢œè‰²,è™šçº¿,è™šçº¿)
     else
      dr.setStroke(ç²—ç»†,é¢œè‰² or å†…éƒ¨é¢œè‰²)
    end
    dr.setColor(å†…éƒ¨é¢œè‰² or é¢œè‰²)
    if type(radiu)=="table" then
      dr.setCornerRadii({radiu[1],radiu[1],radiu[2],radiu[2],radiu[3],radiu[3],radiu[4],radiu[4]})
     elseif type(radiu)=="number" then
      dr.setCornerRadii({radiu,radiu,radiu,radiu,radiu,radiu,radiu,radiu})
    end
    ID.setBackgroundDrawable(dr)
    return dr
   else
    return nil
  end
end

    ,0,utf8.len(spannable),Spannable.SPAN_EXCLUSIVE_INCLUSIVE)--ç”¨utf8.lençš„åŸå› æ˜¯string.lenæ£€æµ‹ä¸­æ–‡é•¿åº¦æ˜¯ä¼šè¯†åˆ«æˆ3ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦

function æ”¹å˜å¤§å°(id,z1,z2,z3,z4,z5,time)

bot

local function range(a,b,c)
 return function(v)    
   if c then
     --æå®šä¸º0
     local d = 0
     if b < a then
       return (v >= d and v <= b) or
       (v>=a and v<=c)
      else
       return v>=b and v<=a
     end
    else
     if a < b then
       return v>=a and v<=b
      else
       return v>=b and v<=a
     end
   end
 end
end

local function equals(k,v)
 if k==v then
   return true
  elseif type(k) == "function" then
   return k(v)
  else
   return false
 end
end

local function switchTab(value)
 return function(tab)
   for k,v in pairs(tab) do
     if equals(k,value) then
       return v
     end
   end
 end
end

local function randomArg(...)
 local len = select("#",...)
 local result = select(
 math.random(1,len),...)
 return result
end

local t = switchTab
(tonumber(os.date("%H"))) {
 [range(6,9) ]= "æ—©ä¸Šå¥½~åƒæ—©é¥­äº†å—ï¼Ÿ",

}

local zmq_timer = require("lzmq.timer")
local ms = zmq_timer.absolute_time()
print("ms: "..ms)
--milliseconds: 1573537133261.0
local s = os.time()
print("s: "..s)
--second: 1573537133
local time2date = os.date("%x", os.time())
print("time2date: "..time2date)
--time2date: 11/12/19
local date = os.date("%Y-%m-%d-%H-%M-%S")
print("date: "..date)
--date: 2019-11-12-13-38-53
function time_stamp_from_ms(t_ms)
    local s_from_ms = math.floor(t_ms/1000)
    local s_to_ms = 1000 * math.floor(t_ms/1000)
    local ms_number = t_ms - s_to_ms
    return os.date("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S.", s_from_ms)..string.format("%03d", ms_number)
end
local ms2str = time_stamp_from_ms(ms)
print("ms2timestamp: "..ms2str)
--ms2timestamp: 2019-11-12 13:38:53.261
function time_stamp()
    local ms = zmq_timer.absolute_time() -- use lzmq
    local s = os.time()
    return os.date("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S.", s)..string.format("%03d", (ms-s*1000))
end
local c_ms2str = time_stamp()
print("current_ms_2_timestamp: "..c_ms2str)
--current_ms_2_timestamp: 2019-11-12 13:38:53.262
local socket = require("socket")
local sms = socket.gettime()
print("socket ms: "..sms)
--socket ms: 1573537133.2631
print(os.clock())
--0.005693

os.date()ä¸­çš„æ—¶é—´æ ¼å¼

%a : abbreviated weekday name (e.g., Wed)
%A : full weekday name (e.g., Wednesday)
%b : abbreviated month name (e.g., Sep)
%B : full month name (e.g., September)
%c : date and time (e.g., 09/16/98 23:48:10)
%d : day of the month (16) [01-31]
%H : hour, using a 24-hour clock (23) [00-23]
%I : hour, using a 12-hour clock (11) [01-12]
%M : minute (48) [00-59]
%m : month (09) [01-12]
%p : either "am" or "pm" (pm)
%S : second (10) [00-61]
%w : weekday (3) [0-6 = Sunday-Saturday]
%x : date (e.g., 09/16/98)
%X : time (e.g., 23:48:10)
%Y : full year (1998)
%y : two-digit year (98) [00-99]
%% : the character '%'
